H0.text: Botanist would be most likely to study changes in animal populations in nature.

H1.text: Engineer is the scientist most likely to study changes in animal populations in nature.

H2.text: Ecologists are scientists who study changes in animal populations in nature.

H3.text: A veterinarian is the scientist most likely to study changes in animal populations in nature.

A4.text: Ecology considers organisms at the individual, population, community, ecosystem, and biosphere levels.
